attributes.action: Impose restrictions on slow moving traffic to reduce road congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The dual carriageways and motorways are heavily congested by slow moving traffic which causes disproportional congestion. This petition calls for banning all vehicles incapable of travelling at the speed limit (such as tractors, caravans, etc) from using these roads at peak hours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
